It was founded around the shared conviction that supporting digital entrepreneurs by providing them with a platform bridging 3 continents _ North America, Europe and China _ constitutes a particularly powerful value-creation strategy.

name: Creadev
description: Creadev is the ever-green private equity firm of the French Mulliez Family. In 2002, it was launched to partner with French entrepreneurs and develop high growth sectors in France. Since 2012, Mulliez family has decided to expand Creadev in Shanghai to cover emerging opportunities in China. It was initially called Crehol China. They currently support 9 French companies and 4 Chinese companies, totaling around 11,000 employees worldwide.

name: Partech
description: Partech Ventures is a transatlantic venture capital firm with offices in San Francisco, Paris and Berlin. Partech invests in Internet and information technology startups at seed, venture and growth stages.Partech's mission is to help outstanding entrepreneurs and disruptive companies to succeed in a global economy. Since 1982, Partech has completed 21 initial public offerings, and more than 50 M&A transactions over $100 million with large international companies (such as eBay, SAP, Vivendi, VMware, IBM, Oracle or TripAdvisor).With $850 million under active management, Partech is consistently ranked among the top 10 VC funds worldwide and number one in Europe by Preqin (the US leading independent research organisation).
